body: And again I've gotten confirmation of my good old rape/abuse theory regarding sakura taisen 3. The cuter, innocent or bitchy/highborn the character the more the rape/abuse inflicted by the degenerated hentai-artist. I'm a (teufelskerl) genius, who finally understood the minds of perverted Sakura Taisen fans, after all I'm one of them. LOBELIA-SAN IS THE BEST, LOBELIAAAAAAAA:
